description: Try our easy to follow Hot Beet Soup With Sausage & Cabbage recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Hot Beet Soup With Sausage & Cabbage
name: Hot Beet Soup With Sausage & Cabbage Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add cumin seeds and shredded white cabbage to same pan and toss over medium heat for 2-3 minutes or until just wilted. Stir cumin and cabbage mixture and cooled, diced sausage through soup and ladle into bowls. Swirl with dollops of sour cream to serve.
